biosecLogger.core

Class UserModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • biosecLogger.core.UserModel
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExUserModel

    public class UserModel
extends java.lang.Object
    Class contains information about user and raw logged data.
    Author:
    Stefan Smihla

        password - encrypted password
        templateHoldCount - number of maximum samples to hold

      • loadTemplateFromString

        protected boolean loadTemplateFromString(java.lang.String template,
                             java.lang.String password)
                                  throws InvalidLoginException
        Load user's template from JSON data.
        Parameters:
        template - template JSON string
        password - encrypted password with sha256
        Returns:
        true on success, false when data are wrong
        Throws:
        InvalidLoginException - raises when password mismatch from template password

      • checkOrientationLogging

        protected boolean checkOrientationLogging()
        Checks if user have logged orientation.
        Returns:
        true if yes, else false
